inclusion.criterion: Born at 34 weeks of gestation or earlier in Nagano Children's Hospital
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: admission into NICU in the same hospital
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Having any major anomalies including suspicion of chromosomal disorder on admission
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: At least one parent is Not Japanese
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: The consent is not obtained by day 7
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Do not survive until discharge home
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 5 months old male with undescended testis, born at 38 weeks with no complications.
